definition: to obtain a certificate or license etc/(PRC) to obtain a marriage license/to marry
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: What did your wife say after registering ?
sentences.chinese: 你老婆领证后说的第一句话是什么？

sentences.english: In addition to this. many couples now cohabit and don't bother to marry.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，现在许多恋人同居但并不急着领证。

sentences.english: Just what would taking a course for the license ensure anyway?
sentences.chinese: 仅仅靠上课领证就能保证这个？

definition: marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)
to get married and have kids/to start a family
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
